title: I made a build guide for crit jungle Yi.
body: Thats how I play Yi and it works pretty well for me. Pls give feedback if you liked or disliked it and tell me why! :D

replies.body: Same here :D.  I like to play 100% crit on Yi (Jgl Item,  IE, Statikk Shiv,  Phantom Dancer, Essence Reaver, and possibly Bloodthirster), because you have damn much Dmg in lategame. One disadvantage is that you don't have tankiness, but you can compensate it with some lifesteal
